list_definition.mean_english: (dùng sau giới từ) đó, ở đó

list_definition.definition: used to introduce sentences in which a state, fact etc is being announced

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There has been an accident at the factory
There seems to be something wrong
I don’t want there to be any mistakes in this.

list_definition.definition: at that time; at that point in a speech, argument etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There I cannot agree with you
Don’t stop there – tell me what happened next!

list_definition.mean_english: đây rồi (thu hút sự chú ý)
list_definition.definition: (with the subject of the sentence following the verb except when it is a pronoun) used at the beginning of a sentence, usually with be or go, to draw attention to, or point out, someone or something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There she goes now! There it is!

list_definition.definition: used for emphasis or to point out someone or something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That book there is the one you need.
There, now. Things aren’t as bad as they seem.

list_definition.mean_english: thấy chưa (bày tỏ sự đắc thắng, sự phấn khích)
list_definition.definition: used when a person has been shown to be correct, when something bad happens, or when something has been completed

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There! I told you he would do it!
There! I said you would hurt yourself!

list_ex_of_english: There's a lot to be said for the innocent ear.
Well, that is rather a romantic poem; there's even less reservation in that.
There's a question of how much market we can afford, without destroying the social ties that make the market possible.
There's a liturgical detachment from the three statements previous to it and the last one, and there's a subjectivity that fills the gap.
All of this makes me think that there's considerable scope for a third party services market around the whole people-search area.
There's that fear of losing your partner to a younger woman.
There's bound to be some conflicts, especially between me and the in-laws.
A lot of kids- when there's any bother they all start running.
list_browse: there’s no love lost between them
